refnamediv.refpurpose: dump diagnostic information about CTDB/Samba installation

refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION
refsect1.para: ctdb_diagnostics is used to dump diagnostic information about a clustered Samba installation. This includes configuration files, output of relevant commands and logs. This information can be used to check the correctness of the configuration and to diagnose problems.

listitem.para: Comma separated list of nodes to operate on
Ignore comment lines (starting with '#') in file comparisons
Do not use commands that assume an Active Directory Server
